body:
bruh. Ntr, netorare is a japanese word for "Cheating"

It is applicable in here since Tsuki is a married woman. And is having an affair with the Mc of the show.

In any ways you look at it, it's still ntr lol.
Ntr isnt supposed when the main character's partner is raped by others?
To nat124 its NTR because the woman Uzaki Tsuki is a married woman and she started to have an affair with Sakurai in this hentai.

How this is ntr?
Not that i complain anything, i prefer this way.
